price: 83 marquées auprès de ton Seigneur. Peu s’en faut que les païens de ton peuple ne subissent un sort identique.
arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا هِيَ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِبَعِيدٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: musawwamatan ʿinda rabbika wamā hiya mina al-ẓālimīna bibaʿīdin
